channel.title: Resources-rsses on Everyone Program: A free, self-paced, coached introduction to computer programming for people who know nothing about it.
channel.description: Recent content in Resources-rsses on Everyone Program: A free, self-paced, coached introduction to computer programming for people who know nothing about it.

item.title: More Resources
item.description:
• Alternative first-start tutorial: Trinket.io.

  • Code Visualization: Python Tutor.

  • Python in the cloud: PythonAnywhere.

  • How to Think Like a Computer Scientist.

  • Python Koans, guided puzzles to solve.

  • Automate The Boring Stuff with Python (Free online introductory book; includes links to books on creating games with Python).

  • Learn to Program with Minecraft (Book for sale; introductory using Python for Minecraft).

  • Introduction to Computing using Python (a free EDX course).

  • Beginner’s resources for HTML, CSS, JavaScript, JQuery, PHP, Python and Ruby.
